title: A Material Harvest
description: Michael Turner is a senior banker who has A loving wife, money and a family pedigree that stretches back to the Civil War. Architect of an acclaimed deal to save Scottish Imperial Bank, he is at the pinnacle of his personal and professional career. After his mother’s funeral Michael disappears. Files for one of Michael’s most important clients are missing too. His colleague and friend, Alex Shepherd, is put in charge of the Bank’s own investigation into the circumstances of Michael’s disappearance. He follows a dangerous and complex trail of money and dead bodies in a desperate attempt to find him. As the search reaches its climax it is clear that the fate of Alex, Michael and Scottish Imperial are at stake.
author: Paul Cranwell
